name: Starship (Tommaso Faraci)
description:
🔵About the game:

Buy the coolest skin and drive your starship through space avoiding planets and getting coins and upgrades!
You will find magnets and shields. You will need the magnets to attract coins from afar while the shields will make you invulnerable for 10 seconds. You have 3 lives available, when you run out of lives the game will end and you will have to start over but... Every time you lose a life another one will appear but it will be up to you to recover it!

🎮Controls:

You can move your ship by clicking and holding using the mouse or the touch-screen! You can pause with the appropriate button or with the SPACE key on the keyboard.

🌐Social and contacts:

My Instagram

Rocket made by Pixel perfect from www.flaticon.com
Planets and stars vector created by freepik - it.freepik.com
Asteroids vector created by brgfx - www.freepik.com
Vibration icon made by Those Icons from www.flaticon.com
Coin vector created by rawpixel.com - it.freepik.com
Explosion animation created by Sinestesia on OpenGameArt.org
